name: autonomous-dev-system
description: Battle-tested autonomous agent protocols with worktree management, zero-tolerance enforcement, and 75+ documented patterns for multi-repo development.
long_description:
A comprehensive autonomous development system featuring:
- Atomic worktree allocation for parallel agent work
- Zero-tolerance enforcement hooks preventing protocol violations
- 75+ documented CI/CD, build, and development patterns
- Cross-repo coordination for complex multi-repository workflows
- Self-improving system with reflection logging
- 10 productivity tools (dashboard, PR status, coverage, etc.)

Designed for serious multi-repo development with enforced best practices.
